node.title: Iconic comedian Gilbert Gottfried dead at 67
node.description: Gottfried died following a battle with "a long illness," his family said.
node.content: ["Iconic comedian Gilbert Gottfried has died after struggling with \"a long illness,\" his family announced Tuesday. He was 67.\u00a0", "\"In addition to being the most iconic voice in comedy, Gilbert was a wonderful husband, brother, friend and father to his two young children,\" the Gottfried family said in a statement on his Twitter account. \"Although today is a sad day for all of us, please keep laughing as loud as possible in Gilbert's honor.\"", "pic.twitter.com/STHhfpVSKU", "This story is breaking. Check back for updates.\u00a0", "Tori B. Powell is a breaking news reporter at CBS News. Reach her at tori.powell@viacomcbs.com"]
